sent.orig: Maybe you are yellow, maybe you are Negro, maybe you are Caucasian.
sent.trans: 也许你是黄种人，也许你是黑种人，也许你是白种人。

sent.orig: Yeah, maybe you're right. Maybe I should get in shape.
sent.trans: 是，也许你是对的。也许我是该恢复一下体形了。

sent.orig: Maybe those men mean me well, maybe they mean me ill.
sent.trans: 也许那些人对我怀有好意，也许他们怀着恶意。

sent.orig: Maybe you can live with it-maybe you can't.
sent.trans: 你也许受得了，也许受不了。

sent.orig: Maybe tonight, maybe day after tomorrow night we will take the interviewing.
sent.trans: 也许今晚，也许后天晚上我们将有一个面试。
